Package camzup.pfriendly

Interface IUp

All Known Subinterfaces:
IUp3, IUpOgl, IYup2
All Known Implementing Classes:
Up3, UpOgl, Yup2, Yup3, YupJ2, Zup3
public interface IUp
Maintains consistent behavior across renderers in the CamZup library.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static float DEFAULT_ASPECT
    Default camera aspect ratio used by perspective camera when size is less than 128.
    static int DEFAULT_BKG_COLOR
    An off-white background color, 255, 245, 215 in RGB.
    static float DEFAULT_CAM_DIST_FAC
    Default scalar by which the height of the sketch is multiplied when the default camera function is called.
    static float DEFAULT_COLOR_MAX
    The Processing default color max.
    static float DEFAULT_FAR_CLIP
    Default far-clip when orthographic or perspective functions are called without the near and far arguments.
    static int DEFAULT_FILL_COLOR
    Default fill color, a light blue.
    static float DEFAULT_FOV
    Default field of view for a perspective camera projection.
    static float DEFAULT_GLYPH_DETAIL
    When a non-zero value is supplied, a font glyph is flattened to line segments.
    static float DEFAULT_HALF_HEIGHT
    Default used by orthographic camera when sketch size is less than 128.
    static float DEFAULT_HALF_WIDTH
    Default used by orthographic camera when sketch size is less than 128.
    static int DEFAULT_HANDLE_COLOR
    Color for the lines connected the forehandle, coord and rearhandle of a curve knot.
    static int DEFAULT_HANDLE_COORD_COLOR
    Color for the curve knot coordinate.
    static int DEFAULT_HANDLE_FORE_COLOR
    Color for the curve knot forehandle.
    static int DEFAULT_HANDLE_REAR_COLOR
    Color for the curve knot rearhandle.
    static int DEFAULT_I_COLOR
    Default color of the x axis when displayed by a camera's origin function.
    static float DEFAULT_IJK_LINE_FAC
    The scalar by which a sketch's dimensions are multiplied to find an appropriate line length.
    static float DEFAULT_IJK_SWEIGHT
    Default stroke-weight of an origin's lines.
    static int DEFAULT_J_COLOR
    Default color of the y axis when displayed by a camera's origin function.
    static int DEFAULT_K_COLOR
    Default color of the z axis when displayed by a camera's origin function.
    static float DEFAULT_LOC_X
    Default camera location on the horizontal axis.
    static float DEFAULT_LOC_Y
    Default camera location on the vertical axis.
    static float DEFAULT_LOC_Z
    Default camera location on the depth axis.
    static float DEFAULT_NEAR_CLIP
    Default near-clip when orthographic or perspective functions are called without the near and far arguments.
    static TransformOrder DEFAULT_ORDER
    Default transform order when converting a transform to a matrix.
    static int DEFAULT_STROKE_COLOR
    Default stroke color.
    static float DEFAULT_STROKE_WEIGHT
    Default stroke weight.
    static float DEFAULT_TEXT_LEADING
    Default text leading.
    static float DEFAULT_TEXT_SIZE
    Default text size.
    static Color.MixHsba MIXER_HSB
    A cached interpolator for HSB colors.
    static Color.SmoothStepRgba MIXER_RGB
    A cached interpolator for RGB colors.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_ASPECT

      static final float DEFAULT_ASPECT
      Default camera aspect ratio used by perspective camera when size is less than 128. Assumes 1:1.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_BKG_COLOR

      static final int DEFAULT_BKG_COLOR
      An off-white background color, 255, 245, 215 in RGB.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_CAM_DIST_FAC

      static final float DEFAULT_CAM_DIST_FAC
      Default scalar by which the height of the sketch is multiplied when the default camera function is called. sqrt ( 3.0 ) / 2.0 .
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_COLOR_MAX

      static final float DEFAULT_COLOR_MAX
      The Processing default color max.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_FAR_CLIP

      static final float DEFAULT_FAR_CLIP
      Default far-clip when orthographic or perspective functions are called without the near and far arguments. 1000.0 .
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_FILL_COLOR

      static final int DEFAULT_FILL_COLOR
      Default fill color, a light blue.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_FOV

      static final float DEFAULT_FOV
      Default field of view for a perspective camera projection. PI / 3.0 .
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_GLYPH_DETAIL

      static final float DEFAULT_GLYPH_DETAIL
      When a non-zero value is supplied, a font glyph is flattened to line segments.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_HALF_HEIGHT

      static final float DEFAULT_HALF_HEIGHT
      Default used by orthographic camera when sketch size is less than 128.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_HALF_WIDTH

      static final float DEFAULT_HALF_WIDTH
      Default used by orthographic camera when sketch size is less than 128.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_HANDLE_COLOR

      static final int DEFAULT_HANDLE_COLOR
      Color for the lines connected the forehandle, coord and rearhandle of a curve knot. Currently diagnostic only, and so not adjustable.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_HANDLE_COORD_COLOR

      static final int DEFAULT_HANDLE_COORD_COLOR
      Color for the curve knot coordinate. Currently diagnostic only, and so not adjustable.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_HANDLE_FORE_COLOR

      static final int DEFAULT_HANDLE_FORE_COLOR

      See Also:

    • DEFAULT_NEAR_CLIP

      static final float DEFAULT_NEAR_CLIP
      Default near-clip when orthographic or perspective functions are called without the near and far arguments. 0.01 .
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_ORDER

      static final TransformOrder DEFAULT_ORDER
      Default transform order when converting a transform to a matrix. TRS is short for Translation-Rotation-Scale.

  • Method Details

    • getGlyph

      static java.util.List<Curve2> getGlyph​(java.awt.Font font, java.awt.font.FontRenderContext frc, java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform, float detail, char character, java.util.List<Curve2> curves)
      A function to convert a character to an list of curve entities. A helper function for other variants of getGlyph.
      Parameters:
      font - the awt font
      frc - the font render context
      transform - the AWT affine transform
      detail - the detail
      character - the character
      curves - the list of curves
      Returns:
      the list of curves
      See Also:
      Font.createGlyphVector(FontRenderContext, char[]), GlyphVector.getOutline(), Shape.getPathIterator(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform), Shape.getPathIterator(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform, double), Font.getSize(), PathIterator.currentSegment(float[]), Vec2.mix(Vec2, Vec2, float, Vec2)

    • getGlyph

      static CurveEntity2[] getGlyph​(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics, java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transform, processing.core.PFont pfont, float detail, char... characters)
      Gets an array of curves from a PFont. The Graphics2D input can be retrieved from a PGraphicsJava2D renderer. The AffineTransform can be null.
      Parameters:
      graphics - the AWT Graphics2D
      transform - the AWT affine transform
      pfont - the PFont
      detail - the glyph detail
      characters - the characteres
      Returns:
      the array of Curve2s

    • getGlyph

      static CurveEntity2[] getGlyph​(processing.core.PFont pfont, float detail, char... characters)
      To convert a character to a glyph with OpenGL- based renderers, Processing uses a deprecated method from an AWT function. That method call has been isolated to this function.
      Parameters:
      pfont - the Processing font
      detail - the curve detail
      characters - the characters
      Returns:
      the array of glyphs
      See Also:
      Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit()

    • glyph

      default CurveEntity2[] glyph​(processing.core.PFont pfont, float detail, char... characters)
      Converts a an array of characters to a an array of curve entities. When the level of detail is 0, uses Bezier curves; when the detailis non-zero, approximates the glyph with a series of straight line segments. The PFont should have been created with createFont, not loadFont.
      Parameters:
      pfont - the PFont
      detail - the level of detail
      characters - the characters
      Returns:
      the array

    • glyph

      default CurveEntity2[] glyph​(processing.core.PFont pfont, float detail, java.lang.String str)
      Converts a string to a an array of curve entities. When the level of detail is 0, uses Bezier curves; when the detailis non-zero, approximates the glyph with a series of straight line segments. The PFont should have been created with createFont, not loadFont.
      Parameters:
      pfont - the PFont
      detail - the level of detail
      str - the string
      Returns:
      the array

    • lerpColor

      Color lerpColor​(Color origin, Color dest, float step, Color target)
      Eases from an origin color to a destination by a step.
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin color
      dest - the destination color
      step - the factor in [0, 1]
      target - the output color
      Returns:
      the color

    • lerpColor

      int lerpColor​(int origin, int dest, float step)
      Eases from an origin color to a destination by a step, where colors are stored in integers.
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin color
      dest - the destination color
      step - the factor in [0, 1]
      Returns:
      the color
